info.title: OERMS Exam Service API
info.description: API documentation for Exam Management Service

get.description: Retrieves a single exam by its ID

put.description: Updates an existing exam (only DRAFT exams can be updated)

delete.description: Deletes an exam (only DRAFT exams can be deleted)

post.description: Creates a new exam in DRAFT status
Unpublishes an exam (returns it to DRAFT status)
Student starts taking an exam and creates an attempt
Publishes an exam (makes it available to students)
Create a copy of existing exam
Cancels a published exam with a reason
Archives an exam (marks it as inactive)

get.description: Retrieves an exam with all its questions and statistics
Checks if an exam is ready to be published
Check prerequisite exams and their completion status
Check if exam is available for student to take
Retrieves all exams created by a specific teacher
Retrieves all published and active exams
Retrieves exams that are currently in progress
Get all exams for a specific subject
Get all exams student can currently take
Retrieves all exams in the system (admin only)

Bearer Authentication.description: Enter JWT token obtained from auth-server
